Articles.Content: I have both the latest FASA pack and RealChute mods installed, however every time I deploy the chutes, I go crashing into the surface at 60 m/s. I'm really not sure what the issue is, considering I have the most recent RealChute installed as well
You may be deploying them too late. Try it  at the moment when they are safe to open.

I was deploying them at upwards of 2000 meters. Turns out the problem was the module manager dll had disappeared from my gamedata folder so RealChute was not working properly. Reinstalled it and all problems solved
Choose a best answer, and goodbye.
i have been looking for the reeal chute beacuse all my crafts go crashing at 80 MPH so can i have the page for the real chute please the one on FASA doesent work thanks

@killer_foxy, Realchute should just work normal:

 

Keep in mind to install all the depencies, Module manager etc etc.
